fields.description: Indicates the provisioning policy associated with Microsoft Managed Desktop settings. Possible values are: notManaged, premiumManaged, standardManaged, starterManaged, unknownFutureValue. The default value is notManaged.
fields.name: ManagedType

fields.description: The OData ID of this entity
fields.name: ODataId

fields.description: The OData Type of this entity
fields.name: ODataType

fields.description: The name of the Microsoft Managed Desktop profile that the Windows 365 Cloud PC is associated with.
fields.name: Profile

fields.description: Indicates whether the provisioning policy enables Microsoft Managed Desktop and, if enabled, specifies the type of plan managing the device. Possible values are: notManaged, premiumManaged, standardManaged, starterManaged, unknownFutureValue. The type property is deprecated and will stop returning data on January 31, 2024. Going forward, use the managedType property.
fields.name: Type
